title: New: Flikka – Ellington
body:
The vocal on this debut track from Sweden’s **Flikka** is absolutely stunning.

Merging songwriting inspired by the classics, much like Lana Del Rey, with more experimental, progressive production, there’s a beautiful sense of personality to _Ellington_. In truth, inspiration wise it feels as close to Regina Spektor as Bjork at times; here’s hoping for plenty more to come. Check it out below.

In truth, inspiration wise it feels as close to Regina Spektor as Bjork at times; here’s hoping for plenty \[…\]
